comments.author: Koji Sekiguchi
comments.body: The fix and the test case,  the test case produces AIOOBE if the fix isn't applied. Thanks!

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.body: Another one! Well, since your country produced Cowboy Bebop, I guess I can get on board here as some kind of minor repayment...

description:
I'm very sorry but this is another one. If q="a b c d" OR "b c", then ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException occurs in FieldQuery.checkOverlap(). I'm working on this and fix with test case soon to be posted.
Thank you for your patient!
summary: FastVectorHighlighter: AIOOBE occurs if one PhraseQuery is contained by another PhraseQuery
